summary: This document is a sealed asset summary from the case US v. Jeffrey Epstein, dated June 30, 2019. It provides a detailed listing of Epstein's financial assets and properties, totaling approximately $559 million, including cash, investments, and real estate holdings in New York, New Mexico, Florida, Paris, and the U.S. Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case US v. Jeffrey Epstein; his assets are being summarized.

events.title: Asset Summary Filing
events.description: A sealed asset summary is filed in the case US v. Jeffrey Epstein, detailing his financial holdings.

locations: 49 ain't) Ranch Road, Stanley, New Mexico 87056

Great St James Island No. 6A USVI 00802 (parcels A,B,C)
Little St James Island No. 6B USVI 00802 (parcels A,B,C)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's total assets were valued at approximately $559,120,954 as of June 30, 2019.

His real estate portfolio included high-value properties in New York City ($55.9M assessed, but noted as potentially worth $77M), New Mexico, Palm Beach, Paris, and two islands in the U.S. Virgin Islands.
Liquid and investment assets (cash, fixed income, equities, hedge funds & private equity) comprised the majority of the total, valued at over $378 million.
The document is sealed and part of the case US v. Jeffrey Epstein (19-cr-490).
There is a discrepancy noted between the assessed value and the market value claimed by the U.S. Attorney's office for the New York City property.
